MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD5 postcode area of Kelso, affecting properties in Spylaw Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.54pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Nailworks Substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:57pm on Tuesday, 19 January 2021
